snippet.title: Nocturnals Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the steam page below!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2578910/Nocturnals/

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you Frog for letting me use 'You Know I'm Down' for the trailer music!

And special thanks to Jamie Halliday for helping me get the rights to use it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Follow the story of Ted as he navigates the abandoned town of Ruddleside, finding a solitary companion in Diego who agrees to help him continue his search for surviving communities.

Explore Stylized 3D Environments: Navigate the atmospheric setting of Ruddleside.
Solve Puzzles and Find Collectibles: Uncover the town's mysteries through various puzzles and collectibles.
Shape Ted's Destiny: Make decisions that influence Ted's personality and determine his fate.

Embark on a heartfelt journey in Nocturnals, coming 2024.
